help-file.title: "VIGORIZE CRITIC"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: No Cumulative: Yes Duration: Instantaneous Type of spell: Enchantment
This handy spell restores to the victim some movement, letting him or her travel farther. The amount of movement restored is dependent on the version of the spell cast. "Vigorize Critic" is more powerful than its counterparts, "Vigorize Light" and "Vigorize Serious".
